title: Cyprus
summary: Cyprus[lower-alpha 6] (/ˈsaɪprəs/ (listen)), officially called the Republic of Cyprus,[lower-alpha 7] is an island country in the eastern Mediterranean Sea. It is the third largest and third most populous island in the Mediterranean[12][13] and is located south of Turkey; west of Syria; northwest of the Gaza Strip, Israel, and Lebanon; north of Egypt; and southeast of Greece. The country's capital and largest city is Nicosia.
